definition: exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.chinese: 這些小海豚長得一模一樣。

sentences.english: Do you know that scientists a sheep into an .
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎，科學家複製了一頭一模一樣的克隆羊。

sentences.english: It was already the same technology they used for the mail.
sentences.chinese: 這和郵遞所使用的方式一模一樣。

sentences.english: You talk like an old man yourself.
sentences.chinese: 你說得就象那個老人一模一樣。

sentences.english: The two sisters look exactly alike.
sentences.chinese: 這兩姐妹長得一模一樣。

sentences.english: I always confuse the sisters: they look so alike.
sentences.chinese: 我總是分不出這對姐妹，她們看上去簡直一模一樣。

sentences.english: This code does exactly the same thing, but with a third fewer characters.
sentences.chinese: 這段代碼做了一模一樣的事情，但是用了更少的字符。
瑪麗和她媽媽長得一模一樣。

sentences.english: You will hear the duplicate of Fuzzy's laugh.
sentences.chinese: 你將會聽到幾乎和富齊一模一樣的笑聲。

sentences.english: KOTORI :You look exactly like what I saw in that dream.
sentences.chinese: 你和我在夢你看見的神威一模一樣呢。

sentences.english: They looked and performed just like the soldiers in Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 從外表上和表演上，他們都和越南的士兵一模一樣。

sentences.english: ' he siad. 'He's exactly like a huge fan.
sentences.chinese: 他說道，“它和扇子是一模一樣的。”

sentences.english: It`s just like the descriptions of Nessie.`
sentences.chinese: 這個東西與有關尼斯湖水怪的描述一模一樣。

sentences.english: This is the same book as Mr Wang lost.
sentences.chinese: 這本書跟王先生丟失的那本一模一樣。

sentences.english: They look like ladies’ red flannel drawers to me.
sentences.chinese: 我看那跟女人穿的紅法蘭絨襯褲一模一樣。

sentences.english: The witnesses' description perfectly matches that of the car that chased me all over town.
sentences.chinese: 目擊者的描述和滿鎮子追我的那輛車簡直是一模一樣。

definition: that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
